title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; lets you chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering ChatOllama, OllamaEmbeddings, and OllamaFunctions wrappers.

title: ollama-webui (Open WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web interface for Ollama with chat history, RAG, admin panel, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing chat, embeddings, model management, and streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate providing strongly-typed APIs for chat, embed, and pull operations.

title: OllamaSharp
summary: .NET library and CLI that wraps the Ollama API; includes a Blazor chat demo.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Simple Go CLI for listing, pulling, and chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles, quantized GGUFs, and fine-tunes compatible with Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Collection of recipes: function-calling, vision, JSON mode, RAG, and multi-model setups.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, CUDA runtime, and GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector and PVC persistence.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal Streamlit app that combines Ollama with Chroma for private PDF question-answering.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama replies into Discord threads with slash-command support.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama with async HTTP, SSE streaming, and native JSON mapping.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-dependent code.

title: ollama-rfcs
summary: Public RFC repository where the Ollama team discusses upcoming features like tool use, multi-modal, and clustering.
